# Welcome! {.unnumbered}

In this open textbook, we highlight some tips and tricks to set up and maintain an open textbook that is:

-   created with Quarto in Rstudio,

-   tracked by git, and

-   published on GitHub Pages

This book is explicitly **not** meant to be complete. We include how to get started, and collect useful ways to customize a Quarto book to your liking.

::: callout-important
This website also contains LOADs of tips for Quarto: https://www.productive-r-workflow.com/quarto-tricks
:::
